bibl.title: Ambivalent roles of centre and periphery

bibl.author: BURASELIS, Kostas

bibl.note: BURASELIS Kostas, Ambivalent Roles of Centre and Periphery in the Hellenistic World. Remarks on the Relation of the Cities of Greece with the Ptolemies until the End of Philometor's Age.
